While listening, you will travel to villages nestled between mountains, to rivers hugging the hills like a silken qiyao ruqun dress. You can see the morning mist resting on the necks of the mountains.
The bamboo flute rises above a Chinese rural village and lifts you toward the sun. The golden reflection of sunlight on the river fills your eyes with a magical happiness. Then, other birds accompany you with the voice of the guzheng, tingling your soul with a smooth pleasureâ€”a pure, natural joy.

It is imported. Flat. Soulless.
